item.description: We are planning to attend the annual fund raiser for the Quincy Families struggling through an illness and or traumatic event. The cost of this fund raiser is a donation of $20 with an all you can eat BBQ and a cash bar. D J music, prizes and a silent auction. Also $5 for children under 12. Please call 1 888 boat bos for rsvp. We will also be visiting Tom Murdock and other club members at the Freedom Boat Club at Marina Bay. The function runs from 7pm to 11pm Sept. 17. Hope to see you at the Landing, Marina Bay Quincy, Ma. Clint
item.how_to_find_us: Let's talk about how to find each other before we go to the event.
item.name: Boston Millionaires 'South Shore Meetup" at the Launch, Marina Bay, Quincy, MA
